reviewText: funny
I really do like this alot but where are the missing 7 episodes?I want them too.

Disappointed that some episodes are missing from what should be a complete series on several DVD's. Where are the missing episodes? Will they be offered on another DVD? I can't be the only buyer to question this error.
This show was very good and I especially enjoyed the ghost scaring Claymore Greg.
Tank you . The DISC is great ! ART
Glad they finally released this series on dvd! Haven't seen this series in years!

I am really glad that they have re-released both seasons of "The Ghost & Mrs. Muir" TV show on DVD. It was a really cute show. My only question about the three discs released for season 2 is this: Why does Disc three have the ending episodes on it, when there should be a fourth disc to cover all of the episodes? If I am not mistaken, there were at least 23 episodes to Season 2, but so far there are only something like 17 episodes listed on the three Dics for season 2. Where are the rest of the episodes? Or was this a mistake and a fouth disc is still in the works? I would really like to have the all of the episodes for my DVD collection.
The best show ever!
very good show, no violence and humor

Hey! There are missing episodes! My favorite one. The Christmas episode where Captain Gregg gives the family a gift of a dream, it was awesome! I remember that episode after 45 years! It was sorely missed! Hoping they will be released soon. I loved all the episodes that were there. It's better to have some than none!
Like I said, I love this tv show. I especially would like to buy the rest of the episodes. Especially "Dear Delusion"
These are copies not Studio released. A whole Lotta money for a copy.
Fantastic!

I LOVE THE CLASSIC TV SERIES OF "THE GHOST AND MRS MUIR" BUT I SEE 7 EPISODES ARE MISSING FROM THE MIDDLE OF SEASON TWO. CAN THESE EPISODES BE RELEASE SOON ON DVD?  I REALLY HOPE SO!!!!  THE EPIOSDES ARE -

THE FIREHOUSE FIVE PLUS GHOST

SPIRIT OF THE LAW

PUPPY LOVE

HOST TO THE GHOST

THE GHOST OF CHRISTMAS PAST

LADIES MAN

NOT SO FAUST

HOPE YOU WILL BE ABLE TO HELP M11 THANK YOU

I love this show and have waited YEARS for a clear quality image and sound dvd set. This DVD set has the sound and image quality, it looks better than it did via "rabbit ears". But....WHERE ARE THE EIGHT MISSING EPISODES?! AMAZON, OR WHO EVER DECIDES THESE THINGS....MAKE THOSE 8 MISSING EPOSIDES AVALABLE AND LETS FINALLY HAVE A COMPLETE SET OF THE GHOST AND MRS. MUIR!!!

WHY LEAVE OUT 8 EPISODES WTF?

Four stars...you will get Five when you provide the missing episodes. Thanks for a good product just not complete!!!!!
A great series, with a great cast - this series should have gone on for several more years -
